text-colors used-
text-white
text-gray-400
text-gray-500
text-blue-800

background color used-
bg-blue-500

padding and margin used for semantics-
w-full h-fit pt-20 pb-10 lg:px-8 xl:px-32


tailwindcss command line to watch--
npx @tailwindcss/cli -i ./src/input.css -o ./dist/CSS/output.css --watch 



cdn links for head-
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/swiper@10/swiper-bundle.min.css" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/7.0.0/css/all.min.css"

    crossorigin="anonymous" referrerpolicy="no-referrer" />
